title: Electrochemical copolymerization of 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene and dithienothiophene: influence of feed ratio on electrical, optical and electrochromic properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11334-11349
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08729H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rashi Kedia, Manisha Khatak, Manisha Balkhandia, Asit Patra
Three different copolymers P[EDOT-co-DTT] were electrochemically synthesized by using different feed ratios of monomers in MeCN/TBAClO4 medium. These copolymers show new properties as compared to homopolymers for electronic applications.
